data.comment: In the minute -1, A total of 8500 spectators is reported.
The match is underway in Leipzig.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Leipzig.
In the minute 2, Leipzig advance rapidly upfield but Florian Badstubner blows for offside.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 4, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Leipzig Schalke attack through Suat Serdar. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
In the minute 6, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
At Red Bull Arena, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Leipzig.
Florian Badstubner awards Schalke a goal kick.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Schalke.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 13, Florian Badstubner awards the home team a throw-in.
Leipzig drive upfield and Emil Forsberg gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Schalke at Red Bull Arena.
Florian Badstubner signals a Schalke throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Leipzig.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Suat Serdar for Schalke who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Can Bozdogan (Schalke) has replaced the possibly injured Suat Serdar.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
In the minute 24, Schalke to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 26, Free kick Schalke.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Schalke.
Schalke have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Can Bozdogan scores to make it 1-0 at Red Bull Arena.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Throw-in for Schalke at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 34, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
Angelino scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
Christopher Nkunku instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Amadou Haidara of Leipzig gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Leipzig are pushing forward but Amadou Haidara's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 43, Florian Badstubner awards Schalke a goal kick.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Red Bull Arena.
Goal! Willi Orban extends Leipzig lead to 3-0 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Marcel Halstenberg.
The second half has started at Red Bull Arena.
Florian Badstubner signals a Leipzig throw-in in Schalke's half.
Free kick Schalke.
Manuel Baum (Schalke) is making a third substitution, with Vedad Ibisevic replacing Goncalo Paciencia.
In the minute 46, Schalke make their second substitution with Frederik Ronnow replacing Ralf Fahrmann.
In the minute 47, Florian Badstubner signals a Schalke throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Leipzig.
Schalke's Can Bozdogan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leipzig.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
In Leipzig, Nordi Mukiele of Leipzig is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 53, In Leipzig, Leipzig push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
Important block from the Leipzig defence as Can Bozdogan fires in a strike for Schalke.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Schalke.
Schalke's Omar Mascarell gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 55, Leipzig are coming forward and Dani Olmo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Schalke have a goal kick.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 56, Leipzig push upfield but Florian Badstubner quickly pulls them for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leipzig's Christopher Nkunku gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 58, In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leipzig surge into the attack at Red Bull Arena but Nordi Mukieleâ€™s header is off-target.
Florian Badstubner awards Schalke a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Leipzig's Dani Olmo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Leipzig's Nordi Mukiele breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Schalke at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Schalke.
Leipzig's Dani Olmo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Leipzig push forward at Red Bull Arena and Dani Olmo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
Schalke will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Leipzig.
In the minute 64, Schalke's Salif Sane has been booked in Leipzig.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Mark Uth gets his shot on target but fails to score for Schalke.
In the minute 69, Leipzig are pushing forward but Marcel Halstenberg's finish is wide of the goal.
Schalke have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 70, Salif Sane is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Alexander Sorloth is replacing Emil Forsberg for the home team.
Julian Nagelsmann is making the team's first substitution at Red Bull Arena with Lukas Klostermann replacing Dayot Upamecano.
In the minute 73, Kevin Kampl of Leipzig gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
Salif Sane returns to the field for Schalke after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
In the minute 76, The home team have replaced Kevin Kampl with Benjamin Henrichs. This is the third substitution made today by Julian Nagelsmann.
Leipzig are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Leipzig have been given a penalty at Red Bull Arena...
Schalke needs to be cautious. Leipzig have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 79, Matija Nastasic (Schalke) has received a yellow card from Florian Badstubner.
Marcel Halstenberg smashes in a penalty at Red Bull Arena. The score is now 4-0.
Free kick in a good position for Leipzig!
In the minute 82, Florian Badstubner awards Schalke a goal kick.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
At Red Bull Arena, Alexander Sorloth has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Lazar Samardzic is replacing Dani Olmo for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 83, Joscha Wosz is on a sub for Angelino for Leipzig.
Throw-in Leipzig.
In the minute 85, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Amadou Haidara.
Amadou Haidara is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 87, Amadou Haidara is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Amadou Haidara is back on his feet again.
In the minute 89, Can Leipzig capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Leipzig's Amadou Haidara gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
That's full-time at Red Bull Arena. The final score is 4-0.
Vedad Ibisevic (Schalke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
